thread.title: Here’s everything Kat Von D Beauty is launching, and our bank account might be sad after all of our purchases
thread.title_full: Here’s everything Kat Von D Beauty is launching, and our bank account might be sad after all of our purchases

author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
title: Here’s everything Kat Von D Beauty is launching, and our bank account might be sad after all of our purchases
text:
Here’s everything Kat Von D Beauty is launching, and our bank account might be sad after all of our purchases There appears to be no end to Kat Von D’s willingness to help her fans happily drain their bank accounts in the name of glorious makeup. Kat Von D Beauty’s new tease has piqued our curiosity and involves all manner of delicious looking products that we can’t wait to get our hands on! We all know Kat works crazy hard and is completely involved in the operation, and it’s awesome to get a look at what’s in development, even if it’s just a tiny peek !
There seems to be a TON of new products headed our way, and we don’t know how we’re going to keep them all straight! Luckily, our friends at Trendmood are the most eagle-eyed beauty lovers around and have broken down everything for us. Let’s unpack this glory, shall we?
O-M-G @thekatvond Reveals it All!!! Well almost everything but she definitely proved her point, showing us that she is 100% involved in her brand from creating the letters of packaging, to Shades, testing ...here she is opening up and showing us A LOT! of #SneakPeeks for upcoming products: 1.NEW #SaintAnddSinner #EyeshadowPalette 2.#GlimmerVeil a metallic/sparkly #lip product 3. The NEW #StuddedKiss shades with the new formula 4. NEW #Mascara #GoBigOrGoHome 5. New Blush 6. New #EverlastingLiquidLipstick shades 7. New perfumes 8. Shade + Light Glimmer *a Shimmery version 9. The Complete Art work for the upcoming First #Traincase 10 Years anniversary And more Take a L K and see if u find anything....#ComingSoon @katvondbeauty Can't wait Now I appreciate #ART and Each #KVD product/packaging even more Are you excited for all the new ??? ✌ #Trendmood #instamakeup #instabeauty #beauty #beautyaddict #cosmetics #bbloggers #bblogger #beautyaddict #beautyblog #beautycare #makeupart #makeupartist #makeupblogger #makeupobsessed #wakeupandmakeup #maquillaje #fashion THANK U for this KICKA$$ update: @kailarodriguez @memoose11 @g_michelle11 @paola.giovana @wordtogloria @glitterkitty2.0 @jesscaa530 @tawna81 @charlottefromnevada @ukii___ @katherine.guzman2405 @ice_queen8891 @legittkitty @brittany_toon @irenexreyes @selfiemakeupqueen U Rock! 
A post shared by TRENDMOOD (@trendmood1) on Mar 20, 2017 at 10:11pm PDT 
How did we live before Instagram’s scroll feature?!
Right off that bat, you can see Kat’s incredible attention to detail in the artwork on all the projects. Nothing slips past her! Here’s what we are looking at in these photos according to Trendmood:
A new Saint and Sinner Eyeshadow Palette and Glimmer Veil, a metallic and sparkly new lip product — could be a lip topper! There’s also new Studded Kiss lipstick shades with the new highly-anticipated formula. Go Big or Go Home Mascara, a new blush, new Everlasting Liquid Lipstick shades, and new perfumes. Let’s not forget the Shade + Light Glimmer palette, a shimmery version of the classic Shade + Light palette.
Totally forgot to tell you guys yesterday that the new Saint+Sinner [Behind the Scenes] video is up! link in bio. X 
A post shared by Kat Von D (@thekatvond) on Mar 17, 2017 at 11:03am PDT 
That’s a whole lot that’s coming our way!
Given that these lovelies are all sneak peeks, we aren’t sure yet when they might be headed our way. We just have to hold our breaths and hope that it’s soon! Kat wouldn’t torture us for too long!
Dinner with @llewellyn and the portrait he painted of me. ❤ 
A post shared by Kat Von D (@thekatvond) on Mar 19, 2017 at 6:59pm PDT 
Keep your eyes peeled for more info on when we can get our hands on all these gorgeous new products!
